description:
I consider the term ""conspiracy theorist"" a badge of honor. Consider the alternative - complacently believing everything you're told, no matter how ludicrous it sounds.

People need to wake up and stop worrying about what people think of them. Sheep being led to the slaughter are extremely trusting of their handlers, as well.

Think about it.

#conspiracytheory #conspiracytheorist #truth #truther #redpill #redpilled #wakeup #speakup #riseup #beforeitstoolate #wedonotconsent #idonotconsent #tyranny #totalitarianism #theresnoplacelikehome #questioneverything #fakenews #hegeliandialectic #orwellian #bigbrother #school #publiceducation #compulsoryschooling #saveyourkids #exodusmandate #problemreactionsolution #indoctrination #dumbingusdown #socialconditioning #usefulidiots
